arts.ttl: Verona vs. Bologna, for safety and for Europe
arts.sum: Hellas Verona will be looking to do the league double over Bologna for the first time in Serie A; In general, the last time they won two games in a row against the Rossoblu in the competition came back in December 1978. Hellas Verona are unbeaten in their last five games at the Bentegodi against Bologna in Serie A (W2 D3), the last away win for the Rossoblu came in November 2017 (3-2 with Roberto Donadoni as coach).

arts.ttl: Exclusive Arsenal Transfer News: Gunners target Bologna wonderkid Santiago Castro
arts.sum: Arsenal scouts are closely monitoring Bologna's talented Argentine forward Santiago Castro as they look to strengthen their attacking options over the coming seasons, FootballTransfers understands. Beyond his league performances, Castro has been instrumental in Bologna's cup runs, notably scoring the decisive goal that propelled the club into the Coppa Italia semifinals for the first time in 26 years.

arts.ttl: Bologna Gives Every Newborn a Bologna Football Kit
arts.sum: In a heartwarming community initiative, Bologna FC 1909 has unveiled a new program that will provide every newborn in the Municipality of Bologna with an official infant-sized club jersey starting January 2025.
